website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy and stylish wipes case great for when you're on the go.
pros: Customers report that this case is solid and sturdy, and like the attractive, space-saving design
we like that it's well-made as well as attractive
An added bonus is the good customer service from this company
cons: Tends to be difficult to open
some said it didn't hold up over time or didn't hold enough wipes

customer_reviews.title: Useful for more than just wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that a friend recommended I try these because they have become a total staple product for my diaper bag. Since this is a two-pack I actually keep one in the car and the other in our diaper bag for changes. I was previously reusing the store bought wipes pouches, but these are of much better quality and the wipes don't dry out as fast. I also like that they don't have to just be for wipes either. They would be great receipt holders or pen cases. I can see myself using these for long after we are past the "baby-wipes" stages.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because of the subtle design and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the subtle design and the ability to see through it to see how low you getting on wipes. As others reviewed it does not hold that many wipes, 15 maybe. I did not believe it would keep wipes very moist as when you zip it up and press on it will air come out the end of the zipper area. But in a month my wife said not really dried out. Not sure if I would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works well for smaller amounts of disinfectant wipes for travel.  Wish there was a small one for face wipes!
customer_reviews.text: Great construction, good looking, easy open/close "zipper," and these will do the trick perfectly for carrying disinfectant surface and hand towelettes (which I buy in a big pop up container and then take out some for travel). Seems to keep them from drying out, but allows you to take a few out of a larger package and only take what you need. Good color and design options. The only thing negative I have to say about this product is I wish they made a smaller version for face towelettes!
customer_reviews.author: Mgmt NinjaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Slim and Great Quality, But Zipper Can Be Tough With One Hand
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: one of the zippers completely broke while at the zoo the other day. Disappointed. I really thought these would last longer than 3 months. These are definitely good. The only reason why I knocked off a Star is the zipper can be a little tough to do with one hand. And if any of you Mama’s know - holding a squirmy, poopy kid usually only allows for one hand to get wipes!
customer_reviews.author: Allison FTM FTWTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Portable, Durable, Best Out There..
customer_reviews.text: It's very difficult to find a good wipe case. Most have this plastic hinge that wears and breaks off over time. This is a very portable option and the zipper is easy to use and seems durable. I have been using the pouch for maybe 6 months now without a problem. I can never get wipes to come up like a kleenex box, but don't really mind. Wipes keep moist in the bag for even up to a month and adding new wipes keeps the contents inside moist. Really the best option I think out there for a slim, portable case.
customer_reviews.author: Chicachi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The size is convenient. It fits perfectly in my purse so I am already ready for unexpected messes and diaper changes. The wipes stay moist thanks to the excellent closure. The wipes are easy to get in and out of the pouch. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Really cool product and AMAZING customer service.
customer_reviews.text: After doing tons or research I decided to get the buti-pod wipes travel case. Since I use "water-wipes" the zipper corroded, however, I wrote their customer service team and received EXCEPTIONAL customer support. They went above and beyond to help me. I recently received their newest product, the plastic click top travel case, and it is PERFECT! If I didn't use water-wipes I know this would have worked for me, but for those of you who are using water-wipes I recommend their other product, it's fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: RKD

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy using these butipods
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using these butipods. I would carry the whole pack of wipes with me, my diaper bag would be so heavy. I can carry my diaper bag now without it getting to heavy. I love the different print as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kray06

customer_reviews.title: Wet wipes for weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I am seriously impressed with these little bags! I've had some wipes in it for weeks and they are still wet. Stylish and easy to get the wipes in and out. I love that the wipes dispense in a similar fashion to the package they came in due to the design of this bag. Holds enough wipes for several changings but is slim enough to fit in the zipper pocket of my JuJuBe bag. I would definitely recommend this item as a diaper bag must have for any mommy!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Pattern Wears onto Wipes!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge disappointment!! I have these in. Coral print and love them- the zipper can be a little bit of a pain- but other than that they're wonderful. I liked them so much I got these ones. I would not recommend them, the Black from the pattern stains the wipes!!! Leaves Black all over them. Just keeps happening- so I can't use the top wipe because it always has black ink on it. I need to just throw them again.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoCowgirl

customer_reviews.title: difficult to get wipes in pouch, not air tight
customer_reviews.text: It extremely difficult to get the wipes in the pouch without rumpling them all up. The pouch is not air tight either and I doubt they wipes will stay moist. I was disappointed there was just a sliding zipper to open and close these pouches. Even though the design is cute I am tempted to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: christina miller

customer_reviews.title: zipper fails
customer_reviews.text: After using this for several months, I really like these cases. However, one major problem I've been having with them is the zipper. The zipper gets stuck at the end and comes off. I've had to re-install the zipper several times. Also, because I've been having trouble with the zipper, the area near zipper is starting to tear because of all the times I've been trying to unstick the zipper. Update: the seller sent me some new ones to replace the broken one I had. I'm so glad. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Lacsina

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hand wipes moist.
customer_reviews.text: I always carry hand wipes in my purse, so I use a Buti-pod case to hold the ones I buy in a large container. It definitely does keep in the moisture better than a couple of otherproducts I have tried, and it lays flat so it fits nicely either in my purse or the car console. I do wish they came in pink or a multicolor floral. That's really the only reason I didn't give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia G.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Cute but they’re tough to get into when you need a wipe in a hurry. You must use two hands - one to hold the pouch, the second to unzip.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to transport wipes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep makeup and body wipes in my gym bag for on the go. They are great! The super adorable pattern makes me feel stylish, rather than an old granny carrying around crumpled tissues. So far, I haven't had any issues with product drying out. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: clementine

customer_reviews.title: Thin and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I get all kinds of compliments on how cute they are! Much thinner than a regular pack of wipes. I was concerned when they came because it looked like the wipes would easily dry out in these, but it hasn’t happened in six weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Gingery

customer_reviews.title: These are definitely one of my best purchases. Not only can I carry wipes anywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely one of my best purchases. Not only can I carry wipes anywhere without worrying about getting my purse wet, but I can water proof documents among other things. Also I have to say that their costumer service is A+++
customer_reviews.author: KYC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, exactly what I was looking for so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, exactly what I was looking for so I don't have to buy a bunch of little travel packs of wipes for the diaper bag (so wasteful!) or haul around a huge pack. Easy to use and keeps wipes damp, doesn't leak. I haven't tried it with cloth wipes yet, but I think it'll work great for those as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee R

customer_reviews.title: Zipper could be much better.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the pattern, and the concept of these cases, but I'm not sure how much use I'm going to get out of them because the zipper parts are very sticky and difficult to open. I can imagine that if I'm wrangling a baby, trying to get the zip open is going to be a challenge. I'll see how they go in practice, and I'm hoping that the zipper smooths out a bit over time and becomes easier to open, but I have my doubts.
customer_reviews.author: sosaidellie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! Our wipes would always dry out so quickly & this keeps them staying fresh for so much longer! This is perfect for keeping in a diaper bag & if you don't use it in a day or two, it's still perfect! I also love that it's clear (my others are opaque), so I can see how many are left without opening it. The leaf design is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Marnell

customer_reviews.title: Keep the wipes pretty wet and are durable enough to withstand staying in a purse and a glove box.
customer_reviews.text: I've used these now for several months and they have kept the wipes relatively wet. There is some drying of the wipes, but it is minimal. And the material is durable and cute. I keep one in the car and one in my purse and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Horasz

customer_reviews.title: Seems great, but didn't suit our needs with twins
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law LOVES her Buti-pods, but unfortunately I returned mine when I found out they only hold 10-15 wipes at a time. It seems like a great product, but we have twins and will go through 10-15 wipes in one outing at least. I do not want to worry about running out or filling it up every time we go out.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Cabin

customer_reviews.title: My purse content crumpled it up and everything was still nice and secure
customer_reviews.text: Hooray for these! My purse content crumpled it up and everything was still nice and secure, no leaks whatsoever. Super easy to put wipes in and the plastic didn't have that new-plastic weird smell I thought it would, which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin C.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps wipes moist!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I used to carry around the huge wet wipe brick until I discovered the Buti Bag. Small, slim, lightweight and can carry plenty of wipes. Wipes never dry out like they can with other wipes cases. Wish I had had this with my son. Keep one in my stroller and one in my diaper bag! A must for anyone with children!
customer_reviews.author: Hime

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift into go and grab bags for a new mom. They are very stylish and hopefully come in handy for her many years to come. You can use them for more than baby wipes. Very nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Cute but I just started using mine and one has a hole and the zipper literally just falls off. Really disappointed. :/ **Edited. After writing the review they sent a replacement for the defective bags. They also informed me of a 90 day warrienty
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought this was a great product, but now I don't think it's great. Both of the pouches broke. The zipper came off of the one, and the zipper came off track on the other one. The one also ripped down the seam where the zipper is, so even once I fixed the zipper, it had a tear down the side.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherC

customer_reviews.title: Wipes case terrific. You won't be sorry you bought.
customer_reviews.text: Like these wet wipe cases very much. Seal is tight, keeping wipes moist first to last. Gusset in the sides opens nicely to accommodate a good supply of wipes. Zipper opening easy to open and close. Have already purchased a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Lindaw

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Not a new mom, but new grandma! My daughter in law turned me on to these to use for the times I am with the baby and for when I am traveling. I will be leaving for Europe soon and plan on taking this on the plane with me and when touring Europe! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about ordering this after reading the reviews but I Haven't had any issues after 2 months of use. And they fit so much nicer in my smaller diaper bags than hard cases.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Ski

customer_reviews.title: Probably not good for heavy, constant or long-term use, but perfect for me and my messy boys
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are flexible enough to fit any bag. They don't hold many wipes but you just have refill it if you use a lot of wipes. Really comes in handy, doesn't leak and keeps wipes moist for days, maybe weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mishaboom

customer_reviews.title: Holds moisture well
customer_reviews.text: I use these for cloth wipes and can comfortably fit about 7 thin wipes (I usually only need one wipe per diaper change). Holds moisture well. Unfortunately one of the zippers broke right off the first time I tried opening it (seems to be made of a plastic material, not metal). It's still usable, just a hassle to open since the pull part of the zipper is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great invention! Keeps my wipes super moist and my baby cannot figure out how to open the zipper but I can easily open it myself :-)
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. They are the perfect size for putting in your purse but the zipper isn’t the sturdiest.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Wieber

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have. They are very low profile and keep the wipes moist for at least a couple weeks. A must have for every diaper bag!!0
customer_reviews.author: D.K.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I use this in my car, and it does a good job at keeping wet-wipes wet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ro

customer_reviews.title: Mommy Must Have
customer_reviews.text: My first time trying these. They are really great. They take up very little space,which is great for an over packer like me. Keeps my wipes moist and they look very sleek!
customer_reviews.author: MoonFamily

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED. Only a few days later after using these
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISAPPOINTED. Only a few days later after using these, the zipper is super RUSTED and stuck (see photos). I am so disappointed, was looking forward to using these cases. Cannot return since they are used.
customer_reviews.author: OB Fishes

customer_reviews.title: Nice wet wipe travel dispenser keeps wipes wet, and soap and perfume smell inside
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine nice looking bag for carrying wet wipes. Some of the wipes have a strong perfume smell, but these bag block that smell and keep the wipes wet.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Jerian

customer_reviews.title: Cute and  convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like these but sometimes they are tough to unzip.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Saves so much space in my diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black bags and they're so pretty (and durable!). I'm also happy the package came with two. With twins, I sometimes go through a lot of wipes in one outing!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Good but smelly
customer_reviews.text: Keeps wipes pretty moist but it does give them a slight plasticy smell after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Tufts

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Functional
customer_reviews.text: Wipes been in there for a few weeks now and they are still wet. Very cute cover designs. They zipper works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: msbathsheba1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I love the fact that I can use my regular wipes for travel and everyday use instead of buying those mini overpriced 10 packs of travel wipes. Much more reliable and fashionable than the sad ziploc I was using in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: amy soest

customer_reviews.title: ... various different wipe cases and so far its been great! Keeps them moist and fresh
customer_reviews.text: I looked and used various different wipe cases and so far its been great! Keeps them moist and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Nat W.

customer_reviews.title: This product looks good but that is about it
customer_reviews.text: This product looks good but that is about it. You will overfill. The sides will split and the zipper will pop off. The case does not hold enough wipes to make having it practical. The Huggies wet wipe case so far has worked the best for me. Hold 3 times as many wipes and can be found at any Target, Walmart, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Phi Phi

customer_reviews.title: Great pouches.
customer_reviews.text: Love these pouches! I have only been using them for a couple weeks but so far they're a nice way to take baby wipes on the go. Cute patterns too!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Always love Buti-pod products
customer_reviews.text: Always love Buti-pod products! It's small and convenient so I can carry it everywhere and don't have to worry about the wipes drying and the bag ripping.
customer_reviews.author: nHii

customer_reviews.title: I love the design
customer_reviews.text: I love the design! And it is very practical for putting it small bags, But one of my bags came broken 😢, after a few weeks I received a new one, great service
customer_reviews.author: Galit P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT doesn't take up as much space as those hard plastic ones!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bag that delivers on its promises.
customer_reviews.text: This wipe bag is great. It's a very flexible plastic and my wipes have been wet since I put them in 2 weeks ago. I appreciate the grown up design and carry this everywhere I go. I don't have a baby, but baby wipes are always useful and now I have a way to store them on the go. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Simona Harwer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: After seeing these on YouTube videos, I caved and ordered a pack even though I was hesistant on how necessary they really are & now I'm hooked! I've been keeping wet ones in one on the outside of my diaper bag and wipes in another inside my diaper clutch & its kept them "fresh" and moist plus slimmed down the bag so much! Definitely will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and convenient. Keeps wipes wet.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small wipes carrier for short trips. This was perfect! I now have one for baby wipes and one for antibacterial wipes for me to use when I don't have a sink to wash up in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These pouches are great to use
customer_reviews.text: These pouches are great to use. They keep the wipes moist better than the sticky flaps on wipes packages that never stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ripped about a week of use .. dissappinted yes since its 2 pouches for 13.00 ...
customer_reviews.author: Beyond Clips

customer_reviews.title: Zipper disintegrated
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on one of the two pouches disintegrated after two months if gentle use, probably opened it 20 times. I'm using Water Wipes, so no harsh chemicals that could have caused this... it's useless now, can't close it anymore :(
customer_reviews.author: MvE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have for your diaper bag! They keep wipes moist for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good design but the end got ripped off after couple uses
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known about these when m6 daughter was born
customer_reviews.text: Love my Buti-pods! The design is cute, practical and extremely effective! It's great to just toss a couple of diapers and a Buti-Pod in my purse if running out on a quick errand.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly compact flexible and easy to fill. Plus they are pretty :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in zipper!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these for almost a year but now the zippers have corroded off. I added in a star because at least the wipes stayed moistened.
customer_reviews.author: Megling

customer_reviews.title: Zipper disintegrated
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, but the zipper disintegrates after a few months. The company only has a 90-day warranty. The zipper is a pain to open and close every time you want a wipe. And, the fact they only last for a few months is a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: I liked how sleek they are but quality is lacking UPDATE: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a few weeks now and one of them came apart. I liked how sleek they are but quality is lacking. UPDATE: They sent me a replacement without me contacting them (other than me writing a review). I was going to contact them, but hadn't gotten around to it. Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bower

customer_reviews.title: Also rips relatively easily. Not worth the money due to durability issues
customer_reviews.text: Underside of zipper wears away exposing black surface and leaving black residue on wipes. Also rips relatively easily. Not worth the money due to durability issues.
customer_reviews.author: Happy girl 238

customer_reviews.title: leak and zippers corrode
customer_reviews.text: These were great for about 5 minutes, then they leaked liquid everywhere, and the zippers corroded. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put in my baby's diaper bag to not take a lot of space. They did kept the wipes moist but to refill every little while was becoming an inconvenience. It's not that easy to stick the wipes in. I just stop using them.
customer_reviews.author: M. G

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: The "zippers" self-destructed after just a few months, so they're pretty much useless because the wipes just dry out within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: cjsea

customer_reviews.title: These are nice looking but it is very difficult to put the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking but it is very difficult to put the wipes in them. Even worse, the zips broke only after a few uses. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Talia M.

customer_reviews.title: A fancy ziplock bag. Works well, but way more expensive than it should be.
customer_reviews.text: I found them little different than using a plain zippered ziplock bag. Product is okay, I guess, but of poor value. At 1/4 the price, I'd probably give it 3.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a month ago and both already broke :( I was hoping that these cute things would last. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cd

customer_reviews.title: One gore after a few months and when I reached ...
customer_reviews.text: One gore after a few months and when I reached for another one, i found out that it was missing a zipper! Wish I could have it replaced or get a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and keeps wipes wet, but the metal zipper piece split open within a month of use, rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amalie L Tuerk

customer_reviews.title: Wipes dry up- fast! Not airtight.
customer_reviews.text: Only owned for a few months and the baby wipes I put in are super dry. The return window closed before I noticed how dry they were, since I use for personal use and not a baby I don't open to use very often. It's also not very easy to fill it with baby wipes despite the zipper concept--- it just doesn't open enough. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: punkofneptune

customer_reviews.title: ... was really excited to receive these because of the great reviews, however on day one
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive these because of the great reviews, however on day one, the little zipper tab broke off- rendering it useless and unable to seal again. Tried to fix it, and then it broke again. I returned.it.
customer_reviews.author: Jet S.

customer_reviews.title: It was good while it lasted (approx
customer_reviews.text: It was good while it lasted (approx. 17 months). Zipper oxidized and broke off. Even before it broke, zipper would come off the tracking
customer_reviews.author: Vince L.

customer_reviews.title: Wipes dry out
customer_reviews.text: Wipes dry out... zipper don’t keep the wipes from drying out. Also not easy for the wipes to come out. Cute design waste of money. Would have returned but had a baby and ran out of time to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rice

customer_reviews.title: Wipes dried out and Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke within 60 days on both. Wipes dried out within a week because seal was not adequate. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mindful Mama

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Made very cheap. Zipper is hard to use. And broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: horrible. I saw your product in a youtube video ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use the as my new baby isn't here yet but I'm tired of carring the big package for my toddler as I have tried the huggies brand pouch and the dispenser part came off...horrible. I saw your product in a youtube video review and heard great things. I'm sure we will enjoy it as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Butipods Reusable Wet Wipe Pouch Slim Case Travel Clutch Holder | Refillable Portable Baby Wipes Dispenser Container | Wipes Stay Moist | Great for Hand and Face Wipes, Set of 2 (Black Ovals & Rings)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black Ovals & RingsALL NEW DESIGNS! 


Designed by a typically busy American Mom, our 2-pack of Butipod wipes cases keep your wipes handy (and moist). Slim, light & flexible, they fit in a purse or pocket for easy dispensing on the go. (Wipes not included.)

You buy wet wipes in bulk to save money, but so often they dry out before you can even use them. Solution? Butipod wipes holders. These compact, portable pouches hold 12-15 wipes each. Unlike bigger containers (with breakable lids), they're easy to carry anywhere. Best of all, they keep your wipes moist for weeks.

Your Convenient Wipes Cases Feature:

 •Premium, nontoxic PVC plastic... totally free of BPA, lead & phthalates
•Convenient center opening for quick, easy access to wipes
•Sturdy zipper that seals out excess air, so wipes stay wet to the last
•Perfect travel size - super-slim & feather-light; only 5" x 8" x 0.5"
•Clear, transparent surface that lets you see when you're running out of wipes


Perfect for Storing Your Bulk Wipes

Simply split your bulk supply of wet wipes into smaller "batches"... That way, you won't have to overpay for those pricey travel-size wipes packs.

Use These Versatile Dispensers to Hold:

 •Baby wipes (including cloth)
•Flushable wipes for potty training
•Makeup-remover wipes
•Sanitizing & disinfecting wipes



Backed by Our 90-Day Warranty So Order Your 2-Pack Now
feature_bullets: THE ORIGINAL REUSABLE ON THE GO WIPES HOLDER THAT TRULY KEEPS WIPES WET! Eco-friendly, durable and translucent flexible plastic with center zipper so you can easily see and dispense wipes as needed. Simply slip into your handbag or diaper bag and go!
US-BASED SMALL BUSINESS! Started in 2008, Butibag is owned and operated by a typical American Mom creating better solutions to everyday kid-toting problems.

WIPES WILL STAY MOIST FOR WEEKS (not days like other containers) because there is no extra air to circulate in the bag! Butipods were invented and designed in 2008 by a mom who was TIRED OF DRIED OUT WIPES! If it needs to stay wet (or dry), our cases have you covered for life’s messy moments.

LIGHTENS YOUR LOAD! Easily split up and carry your favorite bulk wipes with no need to buy the travel packs anymore! Each set comes with a 2-pack of butipods and each butipod can hold 12-15 wipes, depending on brand and thickness. No more dried-out wipes with the bonus of being eco-friendly with less packaging waste!
EASY DISPENSING TRAVEL WET-WIPES CONTAINER & LOADS OF STYLISH DESIGNS! Be sure to also check out our other options. (SORRY - WIPES SHOWN ARE FOR DISPLAY ONLY AND NOT INCLUDED)
